DOC.brief_title: Delayed Effects Treatment Cancer Survivors ( DETECS )
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aim 1 : To compare marker ovarian reserve cancer survivor healthy control . Hypothesis : Cancer survivor low serum Anti-Mullerian Hormone ( AMH ) antral follicle count ( AFC ) , high Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) healthy control . Specific Aim 2 : To compare cardio-metabolic , endocrine bone profile cancer survivor control use combination anthropometric measure , fast serum marker , urinary marker bone health . Hypothesis : Cancer survivor higher total cholesterol lower 25-OH vitamin D healthy control . Specific Aim 3 : To evaluate potential association ovarian reserve marker metabolism , obesity , tumor bone health young female cancer survivor . Hypothesis : As BMI total cholesterol increase , serum AMH decrease . Specific Aim 4 : To compare quality life marker , assess validated instrument , cancer survivor control use recommend score technique . Hypothesis : Cancer survivor low quality life marker compare control . The investigator conduct prospective study characterize quality life cardio-metabolic , endocrine , bone profile female cancer survivor use combination anthropometric , serum , urinary , ultrasonographic marker combination QOL instrument .
DOC.criteria: Exposed : Females age 18 45 , least 2 year completion cancer therapy . Subjects one follow cancer diagnosis : breast , leukemia , lymphoma , and/or gynecologic cancer . Subjects must also postmenarchal , uterus , least one intact ovary , must willing able comply study procedure . Subjects menopausal status within 10 year post treatment . Unexposed : Females age 18 45 prior history cancer treatment . Exposed : Pregnancy , lactation within previous 3 month , medical condition cancer know correlation premature menopause ( i.e . Turner 's syndrome , Fragile X , gonadal dysgenesis , polyglandular autoimmune syndrome , lupus , etc . ) , hormonal contraceptive use within 3 month . Unexposed : Healthy control history polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) , diabetes , thyroid dysfunction , hypertension , hypercholesterolemia exclude addition cancer patient survivors one aforementioned disease diagnose prior cancer diagnosis treatment .
